nodes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: mul

nodes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
nodes.name: div

nodes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
nodes.name: sub

nodes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
nodes.name: add

nodes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
nodes.name: mod

nodes.documentation:

account.

nodes.name: recordMove

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

lock().details: Function to lock record changes on this contracts
lock().return: True if the operation was successful.

recordCreate(address,uint256,bool).details: Used to calculate and store the amount of claimable GTX for those exsisting FIN point holders who opt to convert FIN points for GTX

params._applyConversionRate: - flag to apply conversion rate or not, any Finterra Technologies company GTX conversion allocations are strictly covnerted at one to one and do not recive the conversion bonus applied to FIN point user balances
params._finPointAmount: - the amount of FINs to be converted for GTX, this param should always be entered as base units i.e., 1 FIN = 10**18 base units
params._recordAddress: - the registered address where GTX can be claimed from

recordMove(address,address).details: Used to move GTX records from one address to another, primarily in case a user has lost access to their originally registered account

recordUpdate(address,uint256,bool).details: Used to calculate and update the amount of claimable GTX for those exsisting FIN point holders who opt to convert FIN points for GTX

params._applyConversionRate: - flag to apply conversion rate or do one for one conversion, any Finterra Technologies company FIN point allocations are strictly converted at one to one and do not recive the cnversion bonus applied to FIN point user balances
params._finPointAmount: - the amount of FINs to be converted for GTX, this param should always be entered as base units i.e., 1 FIN = 10**18 base units
params._recordAddress: - the registered address where GTX can be claimed from

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

params._conversionRate: is the rate applied during FIN Point to GTX conversion

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
